LOGIN.REMEMBER_ME: Spara lösenordet på den här datorn
LOGIN.ALERT: Det här är ett privat system. Försök inte logga in om du inte har tillåtelse till det.

REQUEST_PASSWORD.NAME: Ditt fullständiga namn:
REQUEST_PASSWORD.ERROR: Informationen gav ingen träff. Kontrollera informationen och försök igen.
REQUEST_PASSWORD.SUCCESS: Ett e-postmeddelande har skickats till dig. Kontrollera eventuellt din skräppost-mapp också.
REQUEST_PASSWORD.EMAIL_TEXT_USER:
SVENSKA: Du har aktiverat 'glömt lösenord' för salen med telefonnummer {%1}. Lösenordet har skickats till {%5} som är den e-postadress som angavs tidigare för den tekniskt ansvarige för den här salen. Han heter {%3} och hans telefonnummer är {%4}.

Användarnamnet som måste användas tillsammans med lösenordet är {%2}.



ENGLISH: You have activated 'forgot password' for the hall using phone number {%1}. The password has been sent to {%5}, which is the e-mail address which was entered earlier for the technical responsible for this hall. His name is {%3} and his phone number is {%4}.

The user ID which must be used together with the password is {%2}.
REQUEST_PASSWORD.EMAIL_TEXT_MANAGER:
SVENSKA: {%1} har aktiverat 'glömt lösenord' för salen med telefonnummer {%4} som du är tekniskt ansvarig för. Hans telefonnummer är {%2} och hans e-postadress är {%3}. Av säkerhetsskäl har lösenordet enbart skickats till dig och inte till honom. Du måste kontakta honom och höra om du ska ge honom lösenordet.

Lösenordet är: {%5}.



ENGLISH: {%1} has activated 'forgot password' for the hall using phone number {%4}, which you are technically responsible for. His phone number is {%2}, and his e-mail is {%3}. For security reasons, the password been sent to you only, not to him. You must contact him to check if he should have the password from you.

The password is: {%5}

WARNINGS.NO_PARTICIPANTS_AND_TRANSMITTERS: Ingen överföring pågår just nu, och inga lyssnare är online.
WARNINGS.PARTICIPANTS_BUT_NO_TRANSMITTER_TITLE: Inget ljud skickas ut till lyssnarna!
WARNINGS.PARTICIPANTS_BUT_NO_TRANSMITTER_TEXT3: Ring därefter upp samma nummer från en annan telefon och kontrollera kvaliteten och justera eventuellt volymen

PARTICIPANTS.ENTER_NAME: Vem är det? Ring och fråga, och skriv namnet här!

REPORT.NAME: Namn
REPORT.NO_ENTRIES: Det finns ingen historik. Listan raderas när webbläsaren stängs.

GENERAL.LOST_CONNECTION: The application lost connection to the server. Check your Internet connection and reload the page.

GENERAL.TITLE: Settings
GENERAL.TECHNICALLY_RESPONSIBLE: The technically responsible for this hall is {{name}}
GENERAL.FIND_HELP_DESC: Click at the top of the page if you need help.

CREATE_SIP_ACCOUNT.TITLE: Create Computer Listener
CREATE_SIP_ACCOUNT.DESCRIPTION: If one wants to listen to meetings via a computer, a computer account attached to the listener's mobile or telephone number is needed. Computer listeners are displayed with on the status page. Computer accounts that have not made any calls for a year, will be automatically deleted. If the listener has lost the password for the computer account, the listener is created again by filling in the fields below.
CREATE_SIP_ACCOUNT.DESCRIPTION_PHONE: The number is displayed at the Kingdom Hall when the listener calling from his computer.
CREATE_SIP_ACCOUNT.DESCRIPTION_EMAIL: Necessary information is sent to this email address. E-mail address is not stored in TeleSal.
CREATE_SIP_ACCOUNT.ALERT_SUCCESS:
Success! The account was created with the following information and an e-mail was sent to the specified e-mail address with details:
Name: {{name}}
Phonenumber: {{phoneNumber}}
Email: {{email}}
CREATE_SIP_ACCOUNT.ALERT_ERROR: System Error! The account was not created. Please try again shortly.
CREATE_SIP_ACCOUNT.DESCRIPTION_MAILTEXT: This message is sent in the mail. Do not write the recipient's phone number in this field.
CREATE_SIP_ACCOUNT.DEFAULT_MAILTEXT: Here is the information you need in order to listen to the meetings from your computer. Contact the technical manager if there is anything you are unsure about. Click on the link below.

CONTACT.TITLE: Technical Contact
CONTACT.SUBTITLE: The Halls Technical Manager
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: There is only one technical manager for each conference room, no matter how many congregations are using it. The technical contact person is appointed by the Kingdom Hall Committee.
CONTACT.ALERT_ERROR: Fejl! Changes were not saved. Please try again shortly.

SIP_ACCOUNT_RETRIEVAL.DESCRIPTION:
Make sure that this is your name and phone number:
{{name}}, {{phoneNumber}}
If there is any mistake in these informations, please contact the technical manager of your Kingdom Hall.

You need the following informations in order to listen to the meetings from your computer. You can use the same information from several devices, fx. a PC and a tablet.
REMARK! You are NOT allowed to distribute these informations to others as they are bound to your name and phone number!
SIP_ACCOUNT_RETRIEVAL.FOOTNOTE: To know how to install and use the app, please click here.
SIP_ACCOUNT_RETRIEVAL.TITLE: Your Personal Information
SIP_ACCOUNT_RETRIEVAL.ERROR_MESSAGE: The number was not recognized, maybe you entered a wrong number? If you own another number, please try it instead. Or contact the one who created this account for you, and ask to have the account created again with the correct number.
